message.body: @kaffie@zid: girl, I conform there is still sth wrong with your ZeroMe profile in your hub. Let's talk in details in your blog post http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.kaffie.bit/?Post:29:KaffieID+Re-Opened
@kaffie@zid:   in your blog post comment area
@tkarita@zid: hi, i haven't check out here for a long time. quite active chatroom:)
@tkarita@zid: but i don't like the model of chatroom. no thread, not suitable for discuss in depth.

@kaffie@zid: I warned u several times in your previous ZeroMe post comment, but u did not take it seriously, which made me so sad. fortunately i did not give up. there is another shame, none of your new comments are shown in your blog: https://bit.no.com:43110/blog.kaffie.bit/?Post:29
